```{r}
devtools::load_all()
library(tidyverse)
full_data = trax_gp34_v1
n_missing_CGG = full_data$CGG |> is.na() |> sum()
n_above_200 = sum(full_data$CGG >= 200, na.rm = TRUE)
v1_usable = full_data |> filter(CGG < 200) |> 
  mutate(`FX3*` = `FX3*` |> droplevels())
compact_fig_caption = "banana"
```
